```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(bbplot)
```


```{r}
borders_data <- read_csv("canc.csv") %>%
  filter(HB == "S08000016")

borders_data

```

```{r}
cancer_year <- borders_data %>%
  select("CancerSite","CrudeRate", "WASR", "Sex", "Year", "IncidencesAllAges") 

cancer_year

```


```{r}
cancer_year_wider <- cancer_year %>%
  pivot_wider(id_cols = "Year",
               names_from =  "Year",
               values_from = "Year")
```



```{r}
ggplot(data=cancer_year, aes(x=Year, y=IncidencesAllAges)) +
  geom_bar()
```




```{r}
    ggplot(cancer_year, aes(x=Year, y=IncidencesAllAges) +
      geom_line() +
      bbc_style() +
      labs(title = "Conversions by Channel", x = "Channel", y = "Number Converted")
```
